name: Roof It!
description:
Have you ever wanted to build a house, but didn't want to pay attention to regulations? Like what even is a permit? Roof It! Is a physics based stacking game where you stack rooms to make a house, but try not to let it fall over D: or you'll understand why house building laws exist ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ but in games, there are no consequences! So just try stacking them again!!!!

Made as a part of Global Game Jam 2019.

Credits

Designer - Lance Sepanak

Concept & 3D Artist - SaAndra Jenkins

Music & Programming - Matthew Willard

Gameplay Programming - Steven Zavala
